text: Stormcrow or storm crow may refer to: * Yellow-billed cuckoo, a species of bird * Gandalf, also called Stormcrow by Théoden, King of Rohan, in Tolkien's legendarium * Stormcrow (album), a 2015 album by Cain's Offering * Stormcrow, member of the British metal band Desecration * Nomenclature of the title 'Stormcrow' may refer to prophetic soothesayers/oneiromancers like Mother Shipton and Nostrodamus.
title: Stormcrow
